power_type.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the [Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/power_type) of a power the entity has.

type.description:
## Power Type

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/power_type)

Checks if the entity has a power that uses the specified [Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/power_type).

Type ID: `origins:power_type`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:power_type",
    "power_type": "origins:active_self"
}
```

This example will check if the entity has a power that uses the [Active Self (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/power_type).
